titleStmt.title: A true friend to the publick. A pleasant cordial-drink at two shillings six pence the bottle, with my experienced and highly approved extract made up into pills, at three shillings the box. They will be delivered to any messenger with directions sealed up, how to use them, which cures perfectly and speedily the venereal pox.
titleStmt.author: Crane, T.
